```{r setup}
library(saferTool)
```
<br>

### Datasets

```{r}
list1 <- list(a = 1:5, b = LETTERS[1:2], d = matrix(1:6)) # 2D list
list2 <- list(1:5, LETTERS[1:2]) # 2D list
list3 <- list(a = 1:5, b = LETTERS[1:2]) # 2D list
list4 <- list(LETTERS[5:9], matrix(1:6), 1:5) # 2D list
```
<br>

### Datasets info

```{r}
list1 # 2D list
list2 # 2D list
list3 # 2D list
list4 # 2D list
```
<br>

### All the arguments
```{r}
comp_list(list1, list1)

comp_list(list1, list3)

comp_list(list2, list4)
```
